p: The molecular weights of the new compounds were in the range 393.48–485.99 Da which was less than 500. Moreover, the calculated molecular volumes of the new compounds were in the range of 401.67 − 481.22 A 3, which was comparable to multi-CDKIs, flavopiridol and palbociclib. In addition, the new compounds showed topological polar surface areas (TPSA) in the range of 57.51–79.50 A 2 compared to 71.93 and 84.30 A 2 for flavopiridol and palbociclib, respectively, Table 7.
